reviews.text: My husband & I spent 3 nights here in a junior suite which had a jacuzzi tub. The price for the suite was 110 GBP a night &, having stayed at several small hotels in London on other trips, I thought we got very good value for the money. True, the rooms are smallish, the TV isn't going to entertain you for long & we would have appreciated a coffee set-up in the room rather than in the bar area but we would still stay here again. The rooms were clean, the staff was very friendly & helpful & the area was perfect. There is a Hilton on Praed St. - right near Paddington - where you can go for more action than you'll find at the Mitre House bar & have actual cocktails which are sometimes difficult to find. Lots of good restaurants & pubs at all price levels in the area too. We also thought breakfast at the hotel was fine.
reviews.title: Very Decent Budget Hotel
Would go back to Mitre House
Safe and good location at Mitre House
reviews.text: We are just back from London. We were staying at the

reviews.title: Little room but great breakfast!
